description:
Merge SpdyProxyClientSocket unittests.

Now that we've got the proper subset of functions merged into SpdyTestUtil,
merge spdy_proxy_client_socket_spdy[23]_unittest into a single unittest.

BUG=226192

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=200434

messages.text:
sweet!

https://codereview.chromium.org/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc
File net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#newcode150
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:150: framer_(SpdyVersionFromNextProto(GetParam()), false),
I wonder if this should be spdy_util_.spdy_version() instead?

https://codereview.chromium.org/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#newcode428
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:428: bool spdy2 = spdy_util_.protocol() < kProtoSPDY3;
nit: looks like we should have a is_spdy2() method on the spdy_util.

PTAL, rch.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc
File net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#newcode150
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:150: framer_(SpdyVersionFromNextProto(GetParam()), false),
On 2013/05/14 20:46:30, Ryan Hamilton wrote:
> I wonder if this should be spdy_util_.spdy_version() instead?

Done.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#newcode428
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:428: bool spdy2 = spdy_util_.protocol() < kProtoSPDY3;
On 2013/05/14 20:46:30, Ryan Hamilton wrote:
> nit: looks like we should have a is_spdy2() method on the spdy_util.

Done.

lgtm

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc
File net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc (left):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#oldcode66
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:66: class SpdyProxyClientSocketSpdy2Test : public PlatformTest {
Did you verify that the spdy/3 version of this file does not have any extra tests?  Going forward the spdy/3 version of a forked file is probably a better choice since we have extra spdy/3 tests, in general.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc
File net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc (left):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/14772037/diff/1/net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc#oldcode66
net/spdy/spdy_proxy_client_socket_unittest.cc:66: class SpdyProxyClientSocketSpdy2Test : public PlatformTest {
On 2013/05/14 23:40:10, Ryan Hamilton wrote:
> Did you verify that the spdy/3 version of this file does not have any extra
> tests?  Going forward the spdy/3 version of a forked file is probably a better
> choice since we have extra spdy/3 tests, in general.

I did start with the spdy/3 test, but they were essentially identical (note the number of lines removed for each) and git's rename-detection decided I started with the spdy/2 test.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/ttuttle@chromium.org/14772037/9001

subject: Merge SpdyProxyClientSocket unittests.
